column4: How can I update my OpenSSH (Version OpenSSH_4.7p1 Debian-8ubuntu1.2, OpenSSL 0.9.8g 19 Oct 2007) on my Ubuntu Hardy ?
if there is an update available, ubuntu will offer it to you
why do you need that version of openssh ?
I did an rkhunter --update and rkhunter -c today and it said that my version was too old
